     Genre    : Action | Sci-Fi                 
                                                
 After defeating the villainous Dr. Siddhant    
 Arya, and bringing his father Rohit back from  
 the dead, Krrish continued fighting against    
 evil and saving innocent lives. Now Krishna    
 is living a happily married life with Priya,   
 while Rohit is using his scientific brilliance 
 to benefit society. And Krrish is everyone's   
 favorite superhero saviour. Unknown to them,   
 a dark force is growing in another part of the 
 world. Kaal, an evil genius, is selfishly      
 misusing his powers to spread fear, death and  
 destruction. And he is being assisted by an    
 army of very dangerous beings, which he has    
 created himself. Not long after Kaal's plans   
 are put into action, both Rohit and Krrish     
 find themselves faced with a crisis of epic    
 proportions, which only they can resolve,      
 together.    IMDB / More Info
